channel.title: Cannot Update :S
channel.description:
Ok. I was playing on my server through '0.0.0.0' IP#, so only I can log onto it so I can test the updates I'v done.
All of a sudden I cannot update the server no more. I close 'run.bat' when I want to update, I then click 'Compile.bat',.. No errors come up! I then click back on 'run.bat',...Still no errors!.
But when I try logging back into my server it says 'Server is currently Offline!', Its never normaly dont that before. :s
I am doing everything right because it worked erlier today just stopped working randomly.
If you can help thanks in advance! =]

item.title: Cannot Update :S
item.dc:creator: @sylarisemo sylarisemo
item.description:
@sylarisemo wrote:

Dude it has to be your compiler try to get another one or possibly try to use a real “ip address” if not try to restart what ever client or Web Client your Using? That might help! sorry if that doesn’t work

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Update :S
item.dc:creator: @nathan0507 nathan0507
item.description:
@nathan0507 wrote:

yes. thats why im confused…

I have my server files - I run it… I can log onto it fine
I compile my server files - I run it… I cannot log onto it because apparently its offline’

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Update :S
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Do you make sure it says compile successful before closing the command box?
Closing while its compiling will cause you not to be able to login sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Update :S
item.dc:creator: @nathan0507 nathan0507
item.description:
@nathan0507 wrote:

yeah thanks, but that one doesnt work either… when i compile my server i cannot log onto it

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Update :S
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Use IP 127.0.0.1 to connect to your own server.

Read full topic
